name: Rockerz 450 Pro
about: It’s time to rock your lives with Rockerz 450 Pro. Get astounded and feel every beat with these bluetooth headphones that are here to make music more fun. With 40mm drivers and the unbeatable boAt Signature sound, groove to your favourite music. Make work and workouts more fun with a mountainous playback time of 70 hours that never gives up on you. With charging just for 10 minutes, enjoy music and your binge sessions non stop for 10 hours! It is time for you to get fresh on fashion and high on comfort with Rockerz 450 Pro.

name: BassHeads 242
about: Get ready to redefine fitness fashion and utility with the wired headphone boAt Bassheads 242, it’s time to get your sport on. It carries ear hooks that are crafted from silicon to maximize comfort and a secure fit that allows you to maximize your workouts. Coated with IPX 4 sweat and water protection, the Bassheads 242 emphasizes on all-around ability with 10mm drivers that reproduce a quality sound. Move around freely with the superior coated cable that reaches comfortably from your pocket till your ears. Connect to a number of devices with ease using the 3.5mm straight jack, because there’s no stress, only sweetness when you’re riding the waves on this boAt. You can tune in and out with the pause/play button that can also take calls (With In-line Mic.) and control volume in-between exercise reputations.

name: Rockerz 518
about: boAt Rockerz 510 is designed to play for Up to 20 hours. Don't just be loud, be loud and clear. We assure you have not heard such powerful bass and vocal clarity from a wireless comfortable headphone with Extra Comfort Ear cups

about: Wireless earbuds to amplify the music you love and forget what’s happening around you. Keep the earbuds in the 470mAh charging case as you carry your style along with your music that allows for a total of almost 15 hours of play-time.

about: Life seems better if the right music is heard the right way. Plug into a blissful listening experience with boAt Airdopes 281 Pro - a truly wireless earbuds powered by boAt Signature Sound. Equipped with ENx™ Technology and four mics, it makes your everyday calling experience hit the roof. Win matches while playing multiplayer games with your friends through its optimum noise cancellation and crystal-clear audio input. So, where are you? Because your perfect audio match is right here - boAt Airdopes 281.

name: Stone 500
about: Become the life of every party with Stone 500. Experience 10W RMS stereo sound and groove with your gang on your favourite tunes. Double the thump with its TWS functionality that lets you connect & play 2 Stone 500 together. The dynamic RGB lights will add to the vibe of your party as you get transported to a club setting. Its universal connectivity with multiple connectivity modes —Bluetooth v5.0, AUX, USB and FM mode. With a Type-C charging interface & instant voice assistant, this wireless speaker will make your life easier as you enjoy the sound of your choice.  With Stone 500, it is time to #BeTheLimelight.

about: When your taste in music is so unique, why should your audio wear be any different? Don’t hold back, choose your vibe with Rockerz 333.

about: The game begins here. With Immortal 1000D gaming headphones, don’t just play the game - feel it, live it, and own it. Now, you can conquer every game with a sound that provides position accuracy and abstracts. Your everyday gaming is now double the fun with its RGB LED lights. Its lightweight and ergonomic build ensure you have a comfortable bender with your friends. Don’t look further, level up with Immortal 1000D headphones.

name: Stone 1200
about: It’s time to enjoy a playback experience like never before courtesy boAt Stone 1200 14W portable wireless speaker with RGB LEDs. The RGB LEDs pave the way for making the ambience suit a lot more to the music being played and set the right vibe! Its 14W thumping sound with passive bass radiator offers sheer musical bliss. It supports instant wireless connectivity with Bluetooth v5.0. Apart from the wireless connectivity, the user has other options in the form of AUX, USB and FM modes as well. The speaker pumps out nonstop audio for up to 9 hours on a single full charge w/o RGB LEDs and up to 7 hours with the RGB LEDs. It’s a 360° cylindrical construct with IPX7 rated water resistance for a carefree listening time and carry strap for easy portability. The speaker also supports TWS feature meaning you can connect two Stone 1200s and forge them into one for a bigger impact. Apart from these great features, the speaker also supports instant voice assistant via just a single tap.

Its latest Bluetooth v5.0 offers seamless instant connectivity.

name: Airdopes 141
about: Let the noise of the world drown as you jam to your rhythm with Airdopes 141. Equipped with 8mm drivers, these dope wireless earbuds make your playlist sound better with crystal clear audio quality and powerful bass. Experience seamless calling and be clearly heard with ENxTM Technology. That is not all,  ASAPTM Charge technology empowers you with 75 minutes of playback with just 5 minutes of charging. With IPX4 Sweat and Water Resistance, there's no stopping you from listening to your workout mix while breaking a sweat. Moreover, its IWPTM Technology and Quick Response Touch Controls ensure you can answer calls and switch music without interrupting your flow. Go ahead, your perfect audio match is right here.

name: Storm Smart Watches
about: The boAt Watch Storm is the perfect companion for your fitness transformation. Your Watch Storm is here to remove all obstructions that you may face in your fitness journey. With its daily activity tracker and 9 different sports modes, it will now be fun to track your journey towards health. Stay alert at all times with smart notifications from your phone with vibration alerts for calls, texts, schedule reminders, alarms, & more! The “wellness mode” of the smartwatch monitors your sleep, heart rate, blood oxygen levels as well as guides you into a meditative state when you need to relax. It also comes with a menstruation cycle tracker that predicts your cycle and health. Its “find my phone” feature will call your phone to easily locate it. The 5 ATM water resistance will keep the watch safe from splashes & sweat too!

name: Aavante Bar 1190
about: Be the life of the party and play music of all genres on Aavante 1190. The 1190 Aavante brings to you the thumping bass experience in boAt Signature Sound that elevates you and suits your mood just about right. 90W RMS ensures that you don’t miss a single beat, with built-in two subwoofers and sound that fills the room up! 2.2 Channel Soundbar is here to give you a theatre like experience at home, so sit back and enjoy to the fullest. Cater to every mood with the Entertainment EQ Modes: Music, Movies, News & 3D and never worry about not having the right connection as Aavante 1190 comes with Multiple Connectivity Modes: USB, BT, AUX, Coaxial, HDMI(ARC). Stay seamlessly connected with Optimum Bluetooth V5.0 and have easy access integrated soundbar controls with Master Remote Controls! With exquisite design and premium finish, let Aavante 1190 define you.

Comfortable to wear, the sleek design has been suited to give a pleasant sensation with its soft material and lightweight build. An inbuilt mic and easy access side controls allow for instant and seamless control. So, carry your style wherever you go and play the game your way with the BOAT Rockerz 400 Punjab Kings Edition.
